value:
$WmMPID_年明レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_NewYear19,Face|Here they are! On guard, everyone.$k$p$WmMPID_年明フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_NewYear19,Face|Nifl and Múspell joining forces. I
never would have imagined it,
myself...$k$p$WmMPID_年明スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_NewYear19,Face|The power of other worlds is
mysterious... Sometimes, I have
such pleasant dreams thanks to it.$k$pAnd a good dream on New Year's is
a good omen, I am told!$k$pBut that's not what we're here for,
is it?$k$p$WmMPID_年明レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_NewYear19,Face|Nifl and Múspell...together, we will
win.$k$p$WmMPID_年明フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_NewYear19,Face|Then let us join our strength—and
fight!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|We have accomplished what we came
here to do. That's what the Order of
Heroes is for!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Yes! So now it's time for New Year's
wishes.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Since everybody is gathered here,
why don't we all go to the shrine
together?$k$p$WmMPID_年明レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_NewYear19,Face|I have a wish I'd like to make...$k$pEternal peace between Múspell and
Nifl.$k$p$WmMPID_年明フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_NewYear19,Face|A fine wish, peace between our
countries.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Ooh, me too! I'll wish for peace as
well.$k$p$EFace|If so many people wish for it, then it
must come true. Don't you think so,
Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes, I believe in it too—peace
between Nifl and Múspell.$k$p$Sbs150|
